name: checkSpelling(of:startingAt:language:wrap:inSpellDocumentWithTag:wordCount:)
desc: Starts the search for a misspelled word in a string starting at specified offset within the string.
declaration:

        startingAt startingOffset: Int, 
          language: String?,

inSpellDocumentWithTag tag: Int,
